content:
I am a golf fan and I am interested in the PGA tour. Can you provide me with the projected PGA rankings for the covid season?
Begin!

The request for projected PGA rankings for the covid season returned an error indicating an invalid season. I will try to gather information on available tours and seasons to verify if the covid season is included.
